content.p: 85% of our academic staff have PhDs and adopt a student-centric approach to learning. Plus, we have a diverse student community from 75 countries that delivers a truly global studying experience. Invest in your future by studying at UNM. Our reputation for excellence ensures that graduates are equipped with transferable skills for a variety of job opportunities. Better yet, our graduates are sought-after by the world's top 100 global brands including With state-of-the-art facilities and comfortable accommodation, studying at UNM allows you to have a balanced student life. Join over 80 student-led clubs to suit your unique interests All the resources for international students to settle in at UNM Explore our amenities to help students take care of their physical and mental well-being "I wanted to further my education at an institution that could provide me with a global British education." â€” Adam Shamil from Sabah, graduated in BA (Hons) International Communications Studies with Film and Television Studies, 2018 Discover our range of support services, including resources for mental health and students with disabilities.
